# device

**Instance Property**

The digitizer that generates the touch. Useful to distinguish touches emanating from multiple-device scenarios.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: Any? { get }
```

## Using Touch Device Properties

- **deviceSize**: The range of the touch device in points, such as 72 ppi.

items.description: The range of the touch device in points, such as 72 ppi.
items.name: deviceSize
